alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Camden; Cumberland; Gloucester (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 1:55PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Atlantic, northeastern Cumberland, southeastern Camden and southeastern Gloucester Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 155 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Millville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vineland, Millville, Hammonton, Buena, Laurel Lake, Newfield, Victory Lakes, South Vineland, Williamstown, Folsom and Collings Lakes. This includes Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 26 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
